verses.content: Chuongchun, nang, ka nau, Krista Isua lunginsietna uma hin suknghetin um rawh.
Chun, hretu tamtakhai laia ka bâua thu i hriethai kha, chuong chu, mi ringum, mi danghai inchûktir sâwng thei dinghai kuoma chun inkawltir rawh.
Krista Isu sipai ṭhatak angin rinum mi tuorpui rawh.
Sipaia um dinga thlangtu chu a suklâwm theina dingin, sipai tû- khawm indo laiin hi dam sûng khawsakna hin ân sukhnawk ngai nawh a.
Chun, in ruolsieknahaia khawm chun mîn thaw sien khawm, dân angin a thaw naw chun inkhumtirin a um ngai nawh a.
Loneitu sin inrim chu a ra chang hmasatu a ni ding a nih.
Ka thu hril hi ngaituo rawh; Lalpa chun kawng iengkimah hriet- theina a pêk ding che a ni sih a.
Isu Krista, David thlaa mi ka Chanchin Ṭha hril anga mithi laia inthawka thonâwk kha, hre zing rawh.
Chu Chanchin Ṭha lei chun thil suksuoltu angin khuop hiel khawpin rinumhai ka tuor hlak a nih; nisienlakhawm, Pathien thu chu khuopin a um si nawh.
Chuleiin, Krista Isua um san- damna chu, chatuona ropuina leh an hmu ve theina dingin, thlanghai lei chun iengkim ka tuor hlak.
Hi thu hi ring a um a nih; “Ama leh ei thi ta si chun, Ama leh hring bawk ei tih;
Ei tuor chun, Ama leh ro rêl ei tih; Ama ei inphat chun, Ama khawmin mîn phat a tih;
Eini ringum loin um inla khawm, Ama chu ringumin a um zing a nih; Ama le ama ân phat thei si nawh a,” ti hi.

Chuong thu chu inhriet thartir zing la, thu mei meiah an insêl nawna dingin Lalpa mithmuah ṭhahnem- ngaitakin inhriettir rawh, chu chu iengkhawm a ṭhahnem nawh a, a ngaituhai ta dingin bohmangna a ni lem hlak.
Sinthawtu mâni sinthaw inzâ- pui ngai nawtu angin, Pathien thutak indiktaka inchûktirin, Pathien pawm tlâka um dingin i theitâwp suo rawh.
Amiruokchu, Pathien inza nawna tieng thu hril mei mei chu nghatsan hlak rawh; chuong ang mi chu Pathien ngâisak nawna tiengah nasa nâwk zuol an ta,
an thu khawm chun pânse fâk angin fa pei a tih, anni lai chun Humenai le Philet an ṭhang a nih.
Chuong mihai chun, “Tho- nâwkna chu tu khawm hin a ni dai tah,” tiin, thutak kawng chu an fe kâwisan a, mi ṭhenkhathai ringna an sukbo hlak.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien lung- phûm nghet chu a la ngîr zing a, hi inchikna hi a nei a, “Lalpa chun ama tahai chu a hriet,” ti le, “Lalpa hming lam taphawt chun suol fe san raw se,” ti hi.

Nisienlakhawm, in ropuia hin bûr le bêl rângkachak le tangkaruoa siem chau a um nawh a, thing le bepila siem khawm a um hlak a; ṭhenkhathai ngaihlut ding a um bawk a, ṭhenkhathai chu ngaihlut naw ding a um bawk.
Chuleiin, miin chuong thilhaia inthawk ân siekieng chun, bêl in- thieng, Lalpa hmang tlâk, sin thaw ṭha tinrênga in zosa, ngaihlut ding mi nîng a tih.
Nisienlakhawm, tleirâwl châk- nahai chu tlânsan la, lungril in- thienga Lalpa lam taphawthai kuom- a chun felna dâm, ringna dâm, hmangaina dâm, inremna dâm hnawt ve rawh.
Amiruokchu, indona a siem hlak ti hrein, insêlna invêt le, var nawahai chun ṭhang nuom naw.
Lalpa suok chun do ding a ni si nawh a, mi po po chungah zaidamin, inchûktir thiemin, suol chungah dâwtheiin,
ama do dinga insiemhai chu thuhnuoirawl takin ân chûktir lem ding a nih; chuongchun, sima thutak an hung hriet theina dingin Pathienin hun remchâng a pêk el thei a nih;
Pathien dit zâwng thaw dingin Lalpa suoka manin, Diebol chânga inthawkin an suok thei hlau rawi mawh.
